page.title: 15Shops in Woodchurch
page.content: This is a list of shops in Woodchurch, and what they sell: {Mace}- sells groceries. {Post Office}- as well as selling the normal things, also sells cards, felts, and ice creams. {Paper Shop}- as well as selling newspapers, sweets, ice cream and crisps, it sells toys. {Antique shop}- sells antiques. {Eurobev}- sells instant drink machines. {Davies Fish Shop}- as well as selling fish and chips, sells vegetables. {Townland Stores}- sells the same as the Paper Shop. {The Dairy}- sells milk, crisps, drink and sweets. {The Butcher}- sells meat and bacon. There are three{pubs}in the village.
